code: @BeforeClass public static void checkCredentialsAndSetup() throws IOException {     // check whether credentials exist     S3TestCredentials.assumeCredentialsAvailable().     // initialize configuration with valid credentials     final Configuration conf = new Configuration().     conf.setString("s3.access.key", S3TestCredentials.getS3AccessKey()).     conf.setString("s3.secret.key", S3TestCredentials.getS3SecretKey()).     FileSystem.initialize(conf). }
@AfterClass public static void clearFsConfig() throws IOException {     FileSystem.initialize(new Configuration()). }
@Override public FileSystem getFileSystem() throws Exception {     return getBasePath().getFileSystem(). }
@Override public Path getBasePath() throws Exception {     return new Path(S3TestCredentials.getTestBucketUri() + TEST_DATA_DIR). }
